entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -34.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25 with temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25 with temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
